column3: str
Haven't seen you around before... Ahem. If you've yet to speak to Searchingway, I suggest you rectify that posthaste.
Welcome to the interplanetary research station, where we analyze exploration data and develop new tools for the betterment of the initiative.
If you would like to take part in our research, it's simple: complete stellar missions to fill up your dataset, then report back.
Our cosmic tools are still prototypes for now, but the more data you bring in for analysis, the more we'll be able to improve them.
Check your exotablet─all the details are there!
You may now participate in cosmic research. Progress is displayed on your exotablet under Cosmic Research.
For more detailed information, check the Exploration Guide.
Welcome to the interplanetary research station! I'd be happy to help you with data reporting, cosmic tools, or whatever else you may need.
What will you do?
Report research data.
Inquire about cosmic tools.
Small talk.
Nothing.
Which research would you like to report?
I'm afraid we've finished work on that dataset. Have you considered broadening your horizons?
You can do better than that, surely? Go and complete more stellar missions. I can't work with anything less than a full dataset.
...And before you say “that's too vague,” all the exact figures you could want are right there on your exotablet.
I realize it's a lot of work, but just think of what you'll gain in return: my boundless appreciation! And a cosmic tool, I suppose.

Report <Sheet(WKSCosmoToolName,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> and have your <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(2),1,1)/> enhanced?

<If(GreaterThan(IntegerParameter(3),0))><Else/><UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow>Upon enhancement, level requirement may exceed current character level.<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
</If><UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>Spiritbond will be reset to 0% and any affixed materia will be lost.<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Report research data.

Report <Sheet(WKSCosmoToolName,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> and obtain the corresponding cosmic tool?
<If(GreaterThan(IntegerParameter(2),0))><Else/><UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow>Level requirement exceeds current character level.<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
</If>
Unable to obtain item. Insufficient inventory space.
Your <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(1),1,1)/>? I'll need to wait until you've finished using it.
Unable to complete trade. The selected gear is currently equipped.

With your help, the <Sheet(WKSCosmoToolName,IntegerParameter(1),0)/> is now complete!



Oh! Right. <Emphasis>Ahem</Emphasis>... And be sure to try out your newly enhanced cosmic tool!
Not to interrupt your report, but with all the data you've gathered, we may be on the cusp of a breakthrough...
Continue reporting research data?
With your help, we've officially reached a new stage of research, and you know what that means: we're in need of all-new data! Check your exotablet for the details.
Your current research level has earned you a new cosmic tool. Which would you like to receive?
Keep in mind that this tool reflects the current stage of our research. I eagerly await your next report!
Nothing.
Ahem! You already have that one, remember?
If you want a cosmic tool, you'll need to bring me data, and lots of it. Your exotablet has all the relevant details.
<Clickable(<Sheet(ClassJob,IntegerParameter(1),0)/>)/>.
